mapper.select: select * from likepost where unum = #{unum} and pnum = #{pnum}
select likepost from likepost where unum = #{unum} and pnum = #{pnum}
mapper.update: update likepost set likepost = #{likepost} where unum = #{unum} and pnum = #{pnum}
mapper.delete: delete from likepost where unum = #{unum} and pnum = #{pnum}
